abstract.t: This specification defines the User-Managed Access (UMA) core protocol. This protocol provides a method for users to control access to their protected resources, residing on any number of host sites, through an authorization manager that governs access decisions based on user policy. This document is an approved Report of the User-Managed Access Work Group of the Kantara Initiative.
